GMI Final Year Project 2025

Never Lose Your Devices Again

Trace'N Find offers real-time device tracking with advanced security features. Locate, secure, and manage your devices from anywhere in the world.

Powerful Features

Everything You Need to Stay Secure

From real-time tracking to remote data wipe, we provide a complete security suite for all your devices.

Real-Time Tracking

Track your devices in real-time using GPS, Wi-Fi, and cellular networks with pinpoint accuracy.

Remote Security

Mark your device as lost and trigger a loud alarm.

Smart Alerts

Receive instant notifications when your device moves or leaves a designated safe zone (Geofencing).

Remote Alarms

Trigger a loud, piercing alarm on your device from anywhere. Helps you locate a misplaced device or deter a potential thief.

Multi-Factor Auth

Secure your account with multi-factor authentication to prevent unauthorized access.

Evidence Logs

View evidence logs which can show pictures taken by the device and messages sent by the finder.

Simple Setup

Protected in 4 Easy Steps

Getting started with Trace'N Find is simple. Follow these easy steps to secure your devices.

1

Create Account

Sign up for a free account in less than a minute with just your email.

2

Add Devices

Register your devices using our simple setup process and intuitive interface.

3

Configure Settings

Customize tracking preferences, security options, and notification settings.

4

Stay Protected

Monitor your devices and receive instant alerts when something happens.

Questions?

Frequently Asked Questions

Find answers to common questions about Trace'N Find.

How accurate is the location tracking?

Trace'N Find uses multiple technologies including GPS, Wi-Fi, cellular networks, and Bluetooth to provide the most accurate location possible. In optimal conditions, accuracy can be within 5 meters outdoors.

Is my data secure with Trace'N Find?

Absolutely. We use end-to-end encryption for all location data and personal information. Our multi-factor authentication ensures that only you can access your account. We never share your data.

What devices are supported?

Currently, Trace'N Find supports **Android** devices and **Windows** computers. We are actively working on expanding support to iOS and macOS devices in the near future.

Can I track my device if it's turned off?

If the device is completely powered off, real-time tracking isn't possible. However, Trace'N Find will show you the **last known location** before the device was turned off. Once the device is turned back on and connects to the internet, tracking will resume automatically.

Ready to Secure Your Devices?

Join thousands of users who trust Trace'N Find to protect their devices. Get started for free, no credit card required.
